snippet: Alfonso Soriano hit a two-run and Anthony Rizzo a solo shot, leading host Chicago to a 6-4 victory.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Chicago Cubs beat San Francisco Giants, 6-4; other results noted.
lead_paragraph: Alfonso Soriano hit a two-run and Anthony Rizzo a solo shot, leading host Chicago to a 6-4 victory.

headline.seo: Cubs Beat Giants, Leaders in N.L. West
headline.main: Giants’ Playoff March Stumbles Over the Cubs
